div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1541 Baiyada, near Safita (Pereia of Ara- dus), N. Phoenicia, 1949 Burial: c. 188 B.C. Contents: 11+ AR Alexander III: late post. tetradr. (Messene 1, Temnus 1, Rhodes 3, Ephesus 1, Phaselis 2 to yr. 33, Aspendus 2 to yr. 19, Aradus 1 of yr. 61) Disposition: dispersed Seyrig, RN 1963, pp. 42, 62; Tr√©sors du Levant (in press)
